News.headline: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Macclesfield Town
News.page_title: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Macclesfield Town
News.URL_keywords: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Macclesfield Town
News.short_description: A preview of the Daggers National League home fixture against Macclesfield Town on Saturday.
News.description:
The Daggers will be looking to make it two league wins on the bounce after beating Eastleigh away 1-0 in their last league game.

John Askey’s Macclesfield currently sit three places and three points below the Daggers in the table. Macclesfield have only lost 5 games so far this season.

Previous 5 Results

Daggers
Daggers 3-1 Wealdstone (FA Cup)
Eastleigh 0-1 Daggers
Torquay 1-0 Daggers
Daggers 0-0 Tranmere
Bromley 1-3 Daggers

Macclesfield Town
North Ferriby 1-4 Macclesfield (FA Cup)
Macclesfield 0-2 Boreham Wood
Barrow 1-1 Macclesfield
Macclesfield 1-0 North Ferriby
Macclesfield 3-0 Wrexham

Team News
The Daggers still look to be without defenders Luke Pennell and Curtley Williams and midfielder Luke Guttridge due to injuries. 

Previous Meetings
The Daggers and Macclesfield have met 16 times in total, with  both teams running out winners 6 times each and 4 draws between the two teams.

National League
There is a full list of fixtures in the league on Saturday. All kick off at 3pm unless stated.

Boreham Wood v North Ferriby United
Dagenham & Redbridge v Macclesfield Town
Dover Athletic v Braintree Town
Forest Green Rovers v Guiseley
Lincoln City v Eastleigh
Maidstone United v Gateshead
Solihull Moors v Tranmere Rovers
Southport v Sutton United
Torquay United v Aldershot Town
Woking v Barrow
Wrexham v Bromley
York City v Chester FC

Tickets
Ticket information for the game can be found here.

Social Media & Online
Follow the Daggers on Twitter for live updates throughout the match (@Dag_RedFC). There will also be updates on our Facebook page (OfficialDaggers). After the match there will be a match report on the website.
